comments:

reproducible with PDT RC3 and Subclipse 1.2.1

Zemek,
Thank you for reporting, we encourage the PDT community to use polarion's plug-in as it is more robust solution: http://www.polarion.org/index.php?page=overview&project=subversive

Regards,
Roy

> [polarion's plug-in] as it is more robust solution

Erm, although I'm not a die-hard subclipse-fan or anything like that, I just have to ask:
When and by whom has /that/ been decided? :-)

Regards,
Mark

polarion's plug-in is affected by this as well: PDT RC3, Subversive 1.1.2 (using JavaHL 1.4.3 win32 binaries)
